Title: Komipo issues tender to buy one mid-March LNG cargo
Description: Korean power generation firm Korean Midland Power, or Komipo, has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on Mar. 14-17. The tender closes on Feb. 9.
Author: CK

Title: US LNG exports reach an all-time high in January, Europe is main beneficiary
Description: US LNG exports reached an all-time high in January, with Europe the main beneficiary of the country's increased shipments for the third consecutive month.
Author: CK
